titles.title: American Worker Temporary Relief Act
To extend the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. American Worker Temporary Relief Act - Amends the Temporary Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002 (TEUCA) to extend the TEUC program to weeks of unemployment ending before April 1, 2003.
